definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[שׁטר]] (√ of foll.; As. šaṭâru, write, Sab. [[סטר]] Hom:Chr 124 DHM:Ep. Denkm. Ar. lii. 2, liv.2; Ar. sat.ara rule (a book), write, sat.run row, line; Aram. [[שְׁטָרָא]], 4t.oro0 document, so Hilpr:Bab. Exp. x.8 CIS:ii.67, Nab. Palm. [[שטר]] Lzb:374: Hom:NKZ i.69 all from As.).
